org.jerkar.builtins.javabuild
Class JkJavaBuild

java.lang.Object
  org.jerkar.JkBuild
      org.jerkar.JkBuildDependencySupport
          org.jerkar.builtins.javabuild.JkJavaBuild

public class JkJavaBuild
extends JkBuildDependencySupport

Template class to define build on Java project. This template is flexible enough to handle exotic project structure as it proposes to override default setting at different level of granularity. Beside this template define a set of "standard" scope to define dependencies. You are not forced to use it strictly but it can simplify dependency management to follow a given standard.

implicitDependencies

protected JkDependencies implicitDependencies()
Description copied from class: JkBuildDependencySupport
Returns the dependencies that does not need to be explicitly declared. For example, it can include all jar file located under build/libs directory.

Normally you don't need to override this method.

Overrides:
implicitDependencies in class JkBuildDependencySupport
